channel.title: Posts on A Strange Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Strange Blog

item.title: Chapter 3
item.description: [Challenge 1] Emdee five for life Well, you see the name Kikimora47, thats me. Looks cool right! Alright let me share the steps I did to get the flag. Steps[Emdee Five for Life BOX]: Open “TRAGET_IP:30891” in the browser we get MD5 string “7It4ykV6YGdvjIm2TE7e”, we have to encrypt it fast and subit a POST request. But if we manualy, it says we are slow so we have to write a python script I followed the blog: https://bigb0ss.

item.title: Chapter 2
item.description: The Starting Point The Starting Point is where our hackthebox journey begins. The title of the page is Learn the basics of Penetration Testing and there are two tiers: Tier 0: This tier have 5 practice machines and few theory modules Meow [Free] Fawn [Free] Dancing [Free] Explosion [VIP] Preignition [VIP] Tier 1: This tier have 6 practice machines and few theory modules Appointment [Free] Sequel [Free] Crocodile [Free] Ignition [VIP] Pennyworth [VIP] Tactics [VIP] Well, I have hacked all the free machines of tier 0 and 1, still going through the theoritical part.

item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: The Begening So, I completed my bachalor’s degree and master’s degree by the year 2018. Collage days were fun, I miss them sometimes. After that, I got job in the field of AI (Artificial Intelligence). This field is/was totally new to me but it’s interesting. This AI (deep Learning) are nothing more then some Statistical model which can help the machine work like human brain (its tries to, not perfect yet.
